metadata.description: Having conversations on public transport for third-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何在公共汽车上礼貌交谈。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Is this the right bus for the city center?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Is this the right bus for the city center?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Asking directions shows you're independent!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Excuse me, is this seat taken?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Excuse me, is this seat taken?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! You can travel anywhere in Ireland now!
